snippet: Dallas Stars forward Rich Peverley, who missed the start of the season because of heart surgery, collapsed during the first period against the Columbus Blue Jackets.
abstract: Dallas Stars forward Rich Peverley, who missed the start of the season because of heart surgery, collapses during the first period against the Columbus Blue Jackets; game is halted and will be made up.
lead_paragraph: Dallas Stars forward Rich Peverley, who missed the start of the season because of heart surgery, collapsed during the first period against the Columbus Blue Jackets.
